summary.job_field: Software Engineering for Safety Critical Systems
research_topics: Static Program Analysis (Abstract Interpretation, Data Flow Analysis)
Dynamic Program Analysis (Runtime Verification, Monitoring, Testing)
Solver Technology (SAT Solvers, SMT Solvers, Theorem Provers)
Programming Languages (Program Logics, Type Systems, Semantics)
Synthesis (Reactive Synthesis, Functional Synthesis, Correctness by Construction)
summary.message: If you have questions, do not hesitate to ask me. If you have colleagues who may be interested, please distribute the offer.
